com.pasdam.regexren.controller

Interface FilterManager.FiltersListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilesListManager
    Enclosing class:
    FilterManager

    public static interface FilterManager.FiltersListener
    Interface that listener that want to be notified when the selected filter changed must implement

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void filterChanged(int filterType, boolean showHidden, java.io.FileFilter filter)
      Notify that the filter is changed

    • Method Detail

      • filterChanged

        void filterChanged(int filterType,
                   boolean showHidden,
                   java.io.FileFilter filter)
        Notify that the filter is changed
        Parameters:
        filterType - id of the new filter to use
        showHidden - indicates whether the filter should accept hidden files
        filter - FileFilter to use, or null if no filter should be applied
